title: Agency the management of any claims for costs to which the following order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Delegation of Claims for Costs Management Functions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (delegation claim cost management functions) order 2024

title: Agency the management of any claims for costs to which the following order
heading: In this Order –
text_norm: 2 order - act 2014 mean national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (no 23 2014) claim cost meaning part 5 act 2014 state authority meaning part 5 act 2014

title: Agency the management of any claims for costs to which the following order
heading: 3. This Order applies to a claim for costs that –
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a claim for costs that – 

(a) 

is against or in favour of – 

(i) 

(ii) 

the State authority specified in the Schedule, either alone or 
with any other person, and 

the Minister for Finance, where the claim for costs referred 
to in subparagraph (i) is also against or in favour of that 
Minister, and 

(b) 

either – 

(i) 

arises before the date of this Order and is a claim for costs 
which the Agency and the State authority specified in the 
Schedule determine should be managed by the Agency, or 

 (ii) arises after such date.
text_norm: 3 order applies claim cost - (a) favour - (i) (ii) state authority specified schedule either alone person minister finance claim cost referred subparagraph (i) also favour minister (b) either - (i) arises date order claim cost agency state authority specified schedule determine managed agency (ii) arises date

title: Agency the management of any claims for costs to which the following order
heading: The management of a claim for costs to which this Order applies is
text_raw:
4. 

The management of a claim for costs to which this Order applies is 
delegated to the Agency. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5. 

It is declared that the Agency shall have the functions specified in section 

34(5) of the Act of 2014. 

[338] 3 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [338]
text_norm: 4 management claim cost order applies delegated agency notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th july 2024 5 declared agency shall function specified section 34(5) act 2014 338 3 4 338

heading: Article 3

SCHEDULE 

Article 3 

State authority to which paragraph (j) of the definition of “State authority” 
applies 

Strategic Banking Corporation of Ireland 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

2 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
